translation.en: [reporter on TV] Five white police officers
translation.ja: 覆面捜査中の黒人警官を殴打した５人の白人警官が 覆面捜査中の黒人警官を殴打した５人の白人警官が １９９１年 覆面捜査中の黒人警官を殴打した５人の白人警官が

translation.en: stand accused of beating a fellow officer in Milwaukee, Wisconsin,
translation.ja: 覆面捜査中の黒人警官を殴打した５人の白人警官が ウィスコンシン州ミルウォーキー

translation.en: a Black man on undercover assignment.
The officer was working undercover Monday night when his vehicle was stopped
translation.ja: 捜査中だった黒人警官は交通違反を理由に

translation.en: on this street for a traffic violation. -[muffled metal grinding] -[TV mutes]
translation.ja: この地点で停車させられました

translation.en: I gotta say, that smell is worse than ever.
translation.ja: 今までで一番ひどい悪臭よ

translation.en: Well, y'know, I had that meat that went bad in that little freezer I got.
translation.ja: 冷凍庫に入ってる傷んだ肉のせいだな

translation.en: No, you said that last week, and I saw you go out to the dumpster and throw out a whole bunch of bad meat,
translation.ja: 先週も そう言ってゴミ収集箱に肉を捨ててた

translation.en: so the smell should be gone by now.
I forgot. My, uh, my tropical fish died.
translation.ja: 忘れてた熱帯魚が死んだんだ

translation.en: They get this disease. It's… it's called ich.
translation.ja: 魚は白点病(イック)によく かかるんだよ

translation.en: Yeah, that's what they call it.
It's something that has to do with the, uh, pH level of the water.
translation.ja: 飼育水のｐＨ値と関係があるんだ

translation.en: Anyway, they all caught it and died, and…
translation.ja: それで魚が全滅しちまって…

translation.en: I'll clean it out this weekend.
Can I buy you a drink?
Oh, well, should we let this gentleman buy us both a drink?
translation.ja: おごってもらうとするか？

translation.en: He must be a real player.
You bought me a drink before. You know that, right?
translation.ja: 前にも おごってくれたよな

translation.en: There ain't a lot of white queens walking up in here with their blond hair.
translation.ja: 金髪の白人はこの店じゃ珍しい

translation.en: You bought me a beer too.
Last time I was in here, just last week.
translation.ja: つい先週 来た時の話だ

translation.en: Didn't even make a move. Did he?
translation.ja: お誘いはなかったけど

translation.en: Well, then, uh, one more for my other friend here.
translation.ja: もう１人の友達にもビールを

translation.en: How long you been drinking tonight, sweetheart?
Well, thank you for the beer, uh…
translation.ja: ビールをどうも　あの…

translation.en: Jeff, I'm Aaron. This is Don and Tracy.
translation.ja: 俺はアーロンでドンとトレイシーだ

translation.en: So you gonna make a move on one of us, player? Or you gonna walk off like last time?
translation.ja: 誰かを誘う？それとも 解散か？

translation.en: Tonight I'm a man of action.
What does that mean, if you're a fine arts photographer?
translation.ja: アート写真家って何だ

translation.en: You make, like, portraits and shit?
It's, like, art photography. Artsy stuff.
translation.ja: 芸術的な写真を撮ってる

translation.en: You guys wanna pose for me, I could give you 50 bucks.
translation.ja: モデルになるなら50ドル払う

translation.en: Are you asking all of us?
Yeah. All you could do it.
translation.ja: ああ　全員モデルをやれる

translation.en: I'm not dropping my drawers for no $50.
translation.ja: 俺は50ドルじゃ脱がない

translation.en: Really good bone structure, I can tell.
I saw you out on the dance floor. The light was hitting it, I could tell.
translation.ja: 照明を浴びる君を見て分かった

translation.en: [Tracy] Bitch, my landlord jacked up the rent. So what the fuck? Don't see y'all offering me no $50.
translation.ja: 家賃が上がったんだ50ドルは見逃せない

translation.en: [man] All right. Well, maybe we'll stop by later.
translation.ja: 俺らも あとで行くかも
住所は 北22番街548号だ

translation.en: Oh, I live just up the street.
[Jeffrey] What kind of work you do?
[Tracy] Whatever work I can get. That's the problem. I don't really have a career.
translation.ja: 何でもやるがキャリアにつながらない

translation.en: It's like, this job, that job.
I thought you said you had a house.
No, I just said that. I didn't want them bothering us.
translation.ja: ウソさ２人に邪魔されたくない

translation.en: [Jeffrey] I really like pork chops. My family sent me a bunch of meat.
translation.ja: ポークチョップ好きだから家族が肉を送ってくれた

translation.en: But I forgot to plug that little freezer in.
translation.ja: でも冷凍庫の電源を入れ忘れ

translation.en: [Tracy] Well, shit. Can I open a window?

translation.ja: 開けても臭いは取れないし

translation.en: I don't like opening them up 'cause of the noise.
But I, uh… I have an air conditioner.
translation.ja: エアコンがあるから⸺ エアコンがあるから⸺ 〝悪魔の聖書〞
〝悪魔の聖書〞 つけるよ つけるよ

translation.en: What is that floatin' in there?
No, that's probably just dish soap or something like that.
translation.ja: 食器用洗剤か何かだろ

translation.en: Sorry, man. I think I'm gonna go.
Why does everybody always wanna leave me?
translation.ja: なぜ みんな 俺を置いてく

translation.en: [scoffs] Leave you? What you mean, leave you? I need some fresh air. It stinks in here.
translation.ja: “置いてく”って何だ臭いから外の空気を吸いたい

translation.en: Well, hey, I said I'd turn on the air conditioner.
translation.ja: エアコンをつけると言ったろ

translation.en: Okay, well, go turn it on.
Well, I wanna show you around first.
Gotta have a little funeral for him.
You're not supposed to put two of 'em in the same tank.
translation.ja: 同じ水槽に２匹入れられない
だが俺は闘うのを見るのが好きだ
よせ どこへ？　逃げるな

translation.en: You're gonna make me do things I don't wanna do.
translation.ja: したくないことをさせるな
ああ さもないと殺す

translation.en: All right? It's just for the photos. I was kidding.
translation.ja: 撮影用だ　ほんの冗談だよ

translation.en: -You're pointing a knife at me! -Calm down and I won't have to.
translation.ja: なら… 落ち着けば刃物は下ろす

translation.en: Why do you have to get all emotional?
Just calm down, go in there.
translation.ja: 落ち着いて その部屋へ

translation.en: Now, that's where the air conditioner is, okay? You just… go in there.
translation.ja: エアコンは寝室にあるからそっちへ
頼む 分かった　行くよ

translation.en: Told you. We're gonna hang out, gonna watch a movie.
translation.ja: 言ったとおりくつろいで 映画を見たら⸺

translation.en: What're we gonna do in here?
[Jeffrey] Quit doing that! Stop trying to leave.
I told you I'm gonna pay you.
Hey, let's go in the other room, okay?
-I wanna watch the movie. -Yeah, I know.
translation.ja: 映画を見たい 分かってる

translation.en: [Tracy] We'll watch the movie in a second, okay?
I have an idea, and I think…
Okay, what do you wanna show me?
I mean, you want to take some photos, right?
translation.ja: 写真を撮りたいんだろ

translation.en: But you gotta put that knife down.

translation.ja: 怖がらせないでくれよ

translation.en: You wanna take some photos, right?
I wanna watch the movie now.
We'll watch the movie first, but I want to take some nudes, all right? That's why you brought me here, right? All right.
translation.ja: 映画も見るけど そのあとヌードを撮るんだろ

translation.en: I don't like horror movies, honey.
Are you scared of the movie or are you scared of me?
translation.ja: 映画が怖い？それとも俺が？

translation.en: Hold on. I'm just gonna skip to the best part.
translation.ja: 一番いいところへ飛ばす

translation.en: Can I listen to your heartbeat?
translation.ja: 心臓の鼓動を聞かせろ

translation.en: I want to hear your heart

translation.ja: 誰か 警察を呼んでくれ

translation.en: [breathlessly] Officers, this motherfucker down the street…
translation.ja: この通りの先にイカれ野郎が…

translation.en: -[officer 1] Whoa. Stay where you are. -He tried to--
You high? You take something tonight?
'Cause he tried to fucking kill me.
translation.ja: ヤツが俺を殺そうとした

translation.en: [Tracy, muffled] I'm telling you. Black people are disappearing all over the city.
translation.ja: 街じゅうで黒人が失踪してる

translation.en: It's just fun and games. You know, like,
translation.ja: ただの おふざけのつもりだった

translation.en: he and I, we're both, uh, homosexuals, so… you know.
translation.ja: お互い同性愛者だからね

translation.en: -He wanted to play cops and robbers. -No, I didn't.
translation.ja: 警察ごっこを… してない

translation.en: Hey, you let us handle this, okay?
Well, like I said before, we were just, uh, playing around and, uh…
translation.ja: 言ったとおりただ ふざけてたんだよ

translation.en: I guess us gay guys can get into that roughhousing frat boy stuff.
Do you have the key to the handcuffs?
Yeah, they're-- It's somewhere in here. I just, uh…
I think it might be in a drawer. Um…
I'll find it. I'll be right back.
You mind if we come in?
I really like cooking pork chops, and family sent me a bunch of meat, but it all went bad.
translation.ja: ポークチョップ好きの俺に家族がくれた肉を腐らせた

translation.en: -Is there anyone else here right now? -No.
translation.ja: 誰かいるのか いや

translation.en: Where's this key, do you think?
I think it might be in the bedroom.
-There's a bunch of gay stuff in there. -Hey, we'll take a look.
Uh, yeah, I think it's, uh…

translation.ja: 下がっててくれ 悪い
写真だよ　ゲイ関連だ
なんてことだ　本物だ

translation.en: [officer 2] Sir, you're under arrest for the attempted murder…
translation.ja: そこの男性の殺人未遂罪で⸺

translation.en: [officer 1] You have the right to remain silent. Anything you say can and will be used against you in a court of law.
translation.ja: あなたには黙秘権があり発言は証拠となりうる

translation.en: You killed my people, you motherfucker. [officer 2] …one will be provided to you.
-Fuck you, piece of shit! -You understand the rights I read?
translation.ja: くたばれ　クソ野郎！

translation.en: For what I did I should be dead.
I hope you die, motherfucker. Fuck you. I fucking hope you die, you piece of shit.
translation.ja: 死ねよ　頼むから死んでくれ

translation.en: All these people been living in here, all this time with the smell and all these sounds coming out of there, and we--
translation.ja: みんな 悪臭と騒音に耐えながら暮らしてて…

translation.en: -Officer, officer, clear a lane. -Ma'am, back in your apartment.
translation.ja: 道を空けて 部屋に戻って

translation.en: -I'm not going back in my apartment! -Back inside.
-No, you gonna listen to me! -Nobody in until the detectives show.
translation.ja: 刑事が来るまで誰も入れるな

translation.en: [woman] And it's because I called y'all.
I called y'all, and I told you over and over a million times
translation.ja: その部屋で何か起きてると何回も訴えたのに

translation.en: that something was going on, and you know what you did?
So what did y'all find in there? Huh?
translation.ja: その部屋で何を見たの

translation.en: What did you find in there?
Yeah, I'll be there right away.
Mr. Dahmer, I'm Detective Kennedy with the Milwaukee Police Department. This is Detective Murphy.
translation.ja: ミルウォーキー警察のケネディとマーフィーです

translation.en: We're going to apologize in advance, Mr. Dahmer. This is likely to be a difficult conversation.
translation.ja: お断りしておきますがおつらい話になります

translation.en: Jeffrey was arrested late last night.
translation.ja: ジェフリーは昨夜逮捕されました

translation.en: Attempted murder. We'd just like to ask you some questions about him.
translation.ja: 殺人未遂ですがいくつか質問を

translation.en: When you said there was a murder investigation,
I thought someone might have tried to murder him.
translation.ja: 息子が殺されかけたかと思ったんですが

translation.en: But he was a quiet boy. He was a good boy.
translation.ja: でも もの静かないい子でした

translation.en: When his mother and I divorced, it was very hard on him.
translation.ja: 離婚ではつらい思いをさせました

translation.en: He just turned 18. He was living alone at the time.
translation.ja: 18歳になったばかりで１人暮らしに

translation.en: I'm sorry. [clears throat] I'm sorry for becoming emotional. I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
translation.ja: 感情的になって 申し訳ない

translation.en: Is there anything else you'd like to tell us?
When he was young, I think he was four,
translation.ja: 確か 息子が４歳の時に

translation.en: And he was never the same after that.
translation.ja: 手術後 息子は変わった

translation.en: there was brain damage from, you know, too much anesthesia.
translation.ja: 麻酔薬の過剰投与で脳が損傷を受けたかと

translation.en: You think that it might have, what?
translation.ja: その手術の影響で 彼が⸺

translation.en: Could you tell me a little bit about what he did?
translation.ja: 息子は何をしたんですか

translation.en: Who this person was that he tried to kill, I guess.
translation.ja: 誰を殺そうとしたんですか？

translation.en: You're aware that your son is homosexual, yes?
translation.ja: 彼が同性愛者だとご存じで？

translation.en: Allegedly, he lured a man back to his apartment and tried to kill him.
translation.ja: 男性を自室に誘い殺そうとしたそうです

translation.en: Uh, the man got away, and when the police arrived to arrest your son,
translation.ja: 男性が逃げ出し 息子さんの逮捕に向かった警官は

translation.en: items around the apartment that indicate
translation.ja: 複数の殺人を息子さんが犯したと⸺

translation.en: that your son has committed multiple murders.
What items? What… What are you talking about?
[Murphy clears throat] I'm just gonna tell you right now, this is gonna be difficult to hear, Mr. Dahmer.
translation.ja: 聞くのさえ おつらい話だと断っておきます

translation.en: There was a human head in his refrigerator.
translation.ja: 冷蔵庫に人間の頭部がありました

translation.en: Two plastic bags in the freezer.
Another containing a set of male genitalia.
translation.ja: 男性器の入った袋もありました
頭蓋骨が５つありました
ナイフとハンマーノコギリに
解体を記録したポラロイド写真も

translation.en: In another drawer, we found a complete human skeleton, the bones had been bleached.
translation.ja: 別の引き出しには漂白された完全な骨格と
容量200リットル強のポリ容器には

translation.en: in various stages of decomposition, as well as other body parts
translation.ja: 他にも体の一部が入っていて腐敗の段階はさまざまでした

translation.en: that he was attempting to dissolve or…
translation.ja: 遺体の溶解を試みていたかあるいは⸺

translation.en: strip the tissue off the bones.
translation.ja: 骨から組織を剥がしていたのか

translation.en: And, uh, we should just tell you
translation.ja: さらに お伝えすることがあります

translation.en: that based on debris on some of the cooking utensils we found
translation.ja: 発見した調理器具の一部に付着していた残骸や

translation.en: and the marks on some of the body parts,
translation.ja: 遺体の一部に残る痕跡を検証しました

translation.en: as well as things your son mentioned to us, we believe…
translation.ja: また息子さんの供述も検討しこう結論づけました

translation.en: he ate some of his victims.
translation.ja: 彼は被害者を食べました

translation.en: [Kennedy] Now, we realize that this is a lot for you to process.
translation.ja: 受け入れるのが大変な話ですから

translation.en: So we're gonna leave you alone for a few minutes to, uh, collect yourself.
translation.ja: しばらく お一人で心を落ち着けてください

translation.en: [reporter 2 on TV] Some neighbors here had complained of a stench for almost a year,
translation.ja: １年近く悪臭を訴えていた隣人たちも

translation.en: but they never imagined what might be causing it.
translation.ja: 原因は想定していませんでした

translation.en: Milwaukee police were led to an apartment in this building after they were flagged down by a handcuffed man
translation.ja: ミルウォーキー警察を凄惨(せいさん)な現場へ案内した男性は

translation.en: What they discovered upon their arrival was almost unspeakable.
translation.ja: 現場にあったのは筆舌に尽くし難い証拠です

translation.en: Numerous pieces from as many as 15 human bodies.
translation.ja: 少なくとも15体の遺体の一部でした

translation.en: [man on TV] It's obvious that there has been a number of human specimens -found within the apartment… -[dog barking]
translation.ja: アパート内で見つかった多数の人体標本は

translation.en: …and to a certain extent, they're hidden in there.
translation.ja: ある程度は身元が分かるかと

translation.en: [reporter 3] A hazardous materials team, breathing from air tanks, confiscated a number of items from the suspect's apartment.
translation.ja: 危険物処理班が現場から押収した多数の証拠品には

translation.en: Among them, they say, photographs and drawings of dead, mutilated bodies and a vat of acid.
translation.ja: 切断された遺体の写真や酸が含まれていました

translation.en: Police believe the suspect may have used the acid to dissolve body parts.
translation.ja: 容疑者は この酸で遺体を溶解した模様です

translation.en: [cop] Ma'am, you have to leave the premises.
We're asking all residents to evacuate for our investigation and their safety.
translation.ja: 捜査と住人の安全のため退去をお願いしています

translation.en: Where exactly am I supposed to go?
The entire building's a crime scene. There's toxic chemicals in here that could be a hazard.
translation.ja: 建物全体が犯罪現場で有毒な化学物質もあります
